wp:term.wp:term_description: Cosmetics product ingredient analysis, known each ingredient risks and benefits.
Inventory of Cosmetic Ingredients as amended by Decision 2006/257/EC establishing a common nomenclature of ingredients employed for labelling cosmetic products throughout the EU.

CosmeticOBS-The Cosmetics Observatory is the leading source of information for the cosmetics sector. European and international regulations, market trends, ingredient news, new products, reports from congresses and trade fairs: CosmeticOBS offers professional cosmetic monitoring updated in real time, on a daily basis.
Decode skincare ingredients fast with our science-based but easy-to-understand explanations. Analyze ingredient lists at a press of a button.

item.title: PROPANEDIOL
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Propanediol is a natural alternative for the often used and often bad-mouthed propylene glycol. It's produced sustainably from corn sugar and it's Ecocert approved.
It's quite a multi-tasker: can be used to improve skin moisturization, as a solvent, to boost preservative efficacy or to influence the sensory properties of the end formula.

item.title: CAPRYLYL GLYCOL
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
It’s a handy multi-tasking ingredient that gives the skin a nice, soft feel. At the same time, it also boosts the effectiveness of other preservatives, such as the nowadays super commonly used phenoxyethanol.
The blend of these two (caprylyl glycol + phenoxyethanol) is called Optiphen, which not only helps to keep your cosmetics free from nasty things for a long time but also gives a good feel to the finished product. It's a popular duo.

item.title: Giorgio Armani Neo Nude Glow Foundation
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A hybrid foundation that provides a fresh, healthy-looking complexion while providing your skin with hydrating benefits.

The formula is infused with hyaluronic acid and glycerine to provide the skin with hydration throughout the day. The formulation offers a lightweight, fresh texture which allows the skin to breathe.

The easily-dispersed mineral pigments offer buildable coverage, resulting in a healthy-looking glow. The foundation comes in 24 shades to enhance the natural beauty of every skin tone.
(from the official website)

item.title: L'Oréal Paris True Match Pressed Powder Foundation
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: This ultra-soft, light-textured powder perfectly matches the colour and texture of your skin for a flawless finish. The micro-fine formula lets you apply a translucent layer or build up more intense coverage to even your skin tone and cover imperfections. It blends so seamlessly it is almost as if you are not wearing make-up.
